body: If the ranger selects two-handed weapon style, he can choose from the following list whenever he gains a combat style feat: Cleave, Power Attack, Pushing Assault, and Shield of Swings. At 6th level, he adds Furious Focus and Great Cleave to the list. At 10th level, he adds Dreadful Carnage and Improved Sunder to the list.
name: Two-Handed Weapon
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Ranger/New Combat Styles/Two-Handed Weapon
